item.title: Recommended Webcams
item.description:
Traditional Webcams:

  • $99 | Logitech C922x Pro Stream Webcam
  • $160 | Logitech StreamCam
  • $180 | Logitech BRIO

Webcam with DSLR Upgrade Path:

  • $180ish | Elgato CamLink 4K + Used - Go Pro Hero 3/4 + Mini-HDMI to HDMI Cable + Mini-USB 2.0 Type B Charger
